statements.__comment: Create STS_ASSUMEROLE_ALLOW relationship from ec2 instance to the associated iaminstance iam role
statements.query:
MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(aa:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(i:EC2Instance)
WITH SPLIT(i.iaminstanceprofile, '/')[-1] AS role_name, aa, i
MATCH (aa)-[:RESOURCE]->(r:AWSRole)
WHERE r.arn ENDS WITH role_name
MERGE (i)-[:STS_ASSUMEROLE_ALLOW]->(r)
